text: Portland is an unincorporated community in Callaway County, Missouri, United States. It is part of the Jefferson City, Missouri Metropolitan Statistical Area. It is located at (38.710161,-91.717166) on Route 94 about twenty miles northeast of Jefferson City. ==History== The village was laid out in 1831. Its location on the Missouri River made it a popular shipping point for the farms and plantations of Callaway County. The name Portland stems from that activity. ==References== Category:Callaway County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Portland, Missouri
